name: The Singapore Sling
description: Of all the drinks that have been mangled over the years, perhaps no recipe has been more tromped upon than that for the drink with one of the greatest names in mixology: the Singapore Sling.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce Cherry Heering or Bols Cherry Brandy
optional: pineapple spear, cherry, and/or orange slice for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine gin, lime juice, Cherry Heering, and Benedictine in a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with club soda, and dash bitters into the drink. Garnish with a pineapple spear, cherry, orange slice or nothing at all.
